code: import React from"react";import Card from"./Card";import{CurrentUserContext}from"../contexts/CurrentUserContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Main(props){var currentUser=React.useContext(CurrentUserContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"profile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:props.onEditAvatar,className:"profile__image",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(currentUser.avatar,")")}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile__text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"profile__title",children:currentUser.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"profile__subtitle",children:currentUser.about})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:props.onEditProfile,className:"profile__button-edit",type:"button"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:props.onAddPlace,className:"profile__button-add",type:"button"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"cards",children:props.cards.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{card:item,onImageClick:props.onCardClick,onCardLike:function onCardLike(){props.onCardLike(item);},onCardDelete:function onCardDelete(){props.onCardDelete(item);}},item._id);})})]});}export default Main;
